des:
Evolve Home is an app that connects to doorbells, thermostats, lights, sensors, and other products using Wi-Fi or Bluetooth. 

Connect Alexa to your Evolve Home products in a few simple steps:
1. Download “Evolve Home” app in app market then register an account (or log in directly if you already have an account);
2. Configure our devices in “Evolve Home” app and name the devices;
3. Enable “Evolve Home” skill, you'll be navigated to the login page, follow the instructions on the page to complete linking;
4. Tell Echo "Alexa, discover my devices". Wait for Echo to say “Search complete”.

Once done, Alexa will simply operate and monitor your devices; a few of the numerous commands mentioned below are examples of what you may ask Alexa.

For thermostat: 
Alexa set my home temperature to 20° until 8 PM
Alexa set my home temperature to 20° for 35 minutes
Alexa resume thermostat schedule 
Alexa what is the temperature in my bedroom?
Alexa what temprature is the basement set to
Alexa increase the temperature by 2°
Alexa decrease the temperature by 2°
Alexa turn off thermostat
Alexa turn on thermostat
Alexa turn on fan

For Leak señor 
Alexa How much water was used today
Alexa How much water did we use on the weekend
Alexa How much water was used in the month
Alexa how much water was used in a year
Alexa Do I have any pending alerts

For curtains 
Alexa open the curtains
Alexa close the curtains 
Alexa open curtains halfway

For lighting 
Alexa turn on backyard lighting 
Alexa turn off lighting
Alexa keep lights on until five
Alexa adjust the brightness
Alexa turn light to 50%

Alexa is compatible with all Evolve Home products
